message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this unique product. I think you'll really love it, and I'm confident you'll get a great value out of it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you being flexible.  I'm really interested, but I'm hoping to get it for a bit closer to my budget. Would you be willing to do $9,000?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to get closer to your budget, and I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I've got to make a living, and $9,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $10,500. This is my best price, but I think you'll find it's still a great value for the product.
Alice, I really appreciate you being willing to negotiate. I'm still aiming to get it closer to my budget. Would you consider $9,500?  I think it's a fair price that benefits both of us.

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking to get closer to your budget, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing out on too much. I'm counteroffering at $10,250. This is my final offer, and I think it's the best compromise we can reach.
